name: Hamster Log (qiqitaro, Lone Gus)
description:
A casual 3d game that's hamster will survive the monster by ice skiing down hills, a hamster can control their friction and movement to ski and evade the obstacles.

Control
  • A and D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to brake
  • R to roll in the air
  • E to make a log stable

Skiing the log to survive a monster to the goal!
